thread.title: Trump may be very flawed but that doesn’t make him mentally ill
thread.title_full: Trump may be very flawed but that doesn’t make him mentally ill

title: Trump may be very flawed but that doesn’t make him mentally ill
text:
17 February 2017 Trump may be very flawed but that doesn’t make him mentally ill Calls from psychiatrists for Donald Trump to be declared unfit to be US president on mental health grounds are misguided, says Dr Allen Frances   register or login for free   users, please log in. Create an account
